beer.name: Heritage Collection: Naughty Goose
beer.description: Naughty Goose's assertive roasted malt body, fruity aroma, unique blend of American hops, and chocolate and caramel notes make it a favorite of our brewpub regulars who are in the mood to indulge their darker side by simply enjoying something that's so indulgent it seems "naughty."
beer.grains: Pale Ale, Munich, Caramel, Chocolate, Wheat, Victory
Pale Ale, Munich, Caramel, Chocolate, Wheat, Victory
